Name: Cerulean Echoes Adrift in the Winds: Part I
Description: Rescue the trapped Aetherfin with KU-Key
QuestDesc: Rescue the trapped Aetherfin with KU-Key

Dialogues.Speaker: KU-Key
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The Aetherfins really can dance, just like in the pictures!

Options.PlotLineKey: You seem to know this type of fish pretty well.

Dialogues.Speaker: KU-Key
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It's just old data, nothing special…

Dialogues.Speaker: KU-Key
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The System does have records on the Aetherfins, but since they haven't been spotted in almost twenty years, I never got the chance to see one.

Dialogues.Speaker: KU-Key
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You've seen the Mutterflies before, right? They're the same kind of creature—both made of pure Remnant Energy.

Dialogues.Speaker: KU-Key
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But unlike the Mutterflies, you won't find any Aetherfin outside the Black Shores. They're unique to this place.

Dialogues.Speaker: KU-Key
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ahhh! Why are these digital Tacet Discords attacking me again!? Stay back!

Dialogues.Speaker: KU-Key
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: L-listen up! Take one more step and I'll activate extermination mode!

Dialogues.Speaker: KU-Key
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: KU-Key switching to extermination mode! Ultimate power!

Dialogues.Speaker: KU-Key
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Warning! Warning—I'm not equipped with this module! Somebody help me!

Dialogues.Speaker: Rover
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hang in there...

Dialogues.Speaker: KU-Key
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Visual module damaged… System disconnecting… Am I... getting formatted?

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_undefined
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: KU-Key is unconscious now. Mission failed.

Dialogues.Speaker: KU-Key
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: We did it! So these are the Aetherfins! It's my first time seeing them myself.

Dialogues.Speaker: KU-Key
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: They look exactly the same as those pictures. Incredible…

Dialogues.Speaker: KU-Key
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ha… Thank goodness you saved me! Thank you so much, Master {PlayerName}!

Dialogues.Speaker: KU-Key
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yes! All thanks to you!

Dialogues.Speaker: KU-Key
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: If you hadn't been here, I wouldn't be in one piece.

Dialogues.Speaker: KU-Key
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Sorry, I was trying to be a hero with no plan and backup.

Dialogues.Speaker: KU-Key
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I saw some Aetherfin were trapped in the corrupted data and thought I could help, but those Tacet Discords just came out of nowhere...

Options.PlotLineKey: This all feels a bit familiar...

Dialogues.Speaker: KU-Key
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But still, we've got work to do!

Dialogues.Speaker: KU-Key
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: All you need to do is find the corrupted data's core and clean it with the System's clearance, just like last time.

Dialogues.Speaker: KU-Key
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I'll do everything I can to assist you! Just don't forget to get clearance from me before you start cleaning!
